lines.text: declare integers i , n , m , c , a and b where m and c = 0
lines.code: int i , n , m = 0 , c = 0 , a , b ;

lines.text: read from the input to n
start for loop from i = 0 to n exclusive
read variables a and b from the input
increment m by one if a is greater than b
increment c by one if a is less than b
if m is greater than c
else if m is less than c
print " Chris " to the output stream
print " Friendship is magic ! ^ ^ " to the stdout

mod_code: int i , n , m , c = 0 , a , b , b ;
